segments.text: I'm just watching this scene unfold, and I can't believe my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are so many things that could go wrong here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most obvious danger is that overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is everywhere, making the floor a slippery hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could collapse or tip over at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so far; it makes me incredibly anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, she's completely oblivious to all of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her unconcern about the rising puddle is infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she realize the damage all that water is doing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before there's a serious accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of frustration watching these avoidable risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The combination of water, an unstable stool, and a distracted adult is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It just makes me want to shout a warning to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is stressing me out immensely.
segments.speaker: PAR
